Title: Analysis of Blockchain Technology and its Application in the Field of Radio Monitoring
abstract: With the increasing rise and rapid development of blockchain technology, the advantages of decentralized, distributed consensus and secure, tamper-evident and reliable database of blockchain technology will become increasingly prominent. Facing the radio monitoring system that generates massive data in the field of radio monitoring, by using blockchain timestamp, distributed consensus and data encryption, it will effectively solve the problem of centralized system of radio monitoring, reduce the construction cost of radio monitoring system, improve monitoring efficiency and ensure data security.

Published in.name: 2021 International Conference on Computer, Blockchain and Financial Development (CBFD)
